title: My Quarantine Birthday
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: (alarm clock beeping) - It's March 20th, 2020, I'm Justine. This is my eighth day of quarantine. Rhyming was unintentional. This is my dog Matty. And it's also the first official day that Los Angeles has shut down, and it's my birthday. We're shut down, but walks outside and exercise is allowed, as long as you're staying six feet away from others. Social distancing. Respectable ratio. (somber electronic music) So, I'm being a little dramatic with the music and the voiceover, because right now this is what I'd normally be doing. It's 5:30 AM, I'm making some coffee, and one of the things that we have to celebrate today, other than my birthday, is the fact that Animal Crossing is out. I got up super early today, because there is a video that is due to post around 5:30 AM, and I haven't finished editing it yet. You guys can't see it because it is behind the scenes, but right now, I'm shooting this on my iPhone. I'm doing a fun little test to see if I can shoot, edit, do all of the voiceovers and everything on IOS. And of course, stay tuned for a video of that later on. But for now enjoy my super dramatic, moody vlog. Don't worry, the whole video isn't gonna be like this, but I guess I'm trying to give you a sense of how I'm feeling. I'm feeling strange, I'm feeling weird, I'm feeling off, and I think however you guys are feeling right now, it's completely valid. I do work with my friend Tyler who shoots a lot of my videos for me and edits. So he got a jumpstart on this edit last night, and while he was doing that I started playing Animal Crossing because it officially came out last night March 19th. Today is March 20th. So he just sent me the XML file of the footage that he was editing, sent me that. I just imported it on to my computer and now I'm gonna finish the edit, adding some music, doing some color correction. Probably edit for a few hours, until the dog decides that he's ready for a walk. The weirdest thing, is the feeling of going outside, is wrong. (somber music) (whimsical music) Do you want to go for a walk? (whimsical music) (water running) (lid clanks) Matty. Hey, who's a good boy? Is it you? Hey, did you know Matty, that this leash is about six feet? And that's how far away we have to be for social distancing. Are you listening to me? Do you care? (whimsical music) (egg cracks) (oven door clicks) (beep) (Matty chews food quietly) (seasoing grinder cracks) And breakfast is made. I'm such a huge fan of that Brava oven, I'm gonna be doing a video with them. It's gonna be a "what I wat in a day", so it's basically everything that I cook in there. It's really been amazing because before I got this oven, I never cooked anything, and you guys know this. I've been wanting to do a video on that for awhile, so now I'm gonna eat and play Animal Crossing. Are you a good boy? Yes, you are. Matty already had his breakfast. He want's eggs but he can't because has an allergy. You already had your breakfast. Keeping consistent and keeping active something that I'm that I'm really trying to do. One of my suggestions for you guys is to download the Peloton app. I'm sure you guys are very familiar with Peloton, with the bike, and the treadmill, but Peloton actually has this entirely incredible digital app. This is not sponsored at all. I've been such a huge fan of them. Check out the app, they have all kinds of really great yoga classes, strength classes, meditation. It's really really awesome. So, especially for a time like this, in the fact it's free 90 days. The perfect time to check it out. How are you doing bud? I went to buy some more of these gym mats, 'cause I wanted to extend it a little bit more, and they're all sold out. Do you know why? Because everybody is trying to work out from home now. Press to Down Dog. Right foot lunges to the hands. Outer left heel drops. (calming music) - Not gonna lie, I barely made it through this today. I'm very tired. I only slept for three hours last night because I got up so early to start editing. But I cannot stress how incredible the Peloton app is. I've been using it for the past year, and I'm definitely lucky enough to have one of the treadmills, but I travel so much that I probably use the digital app more than the actual treadmill in my house. It's really great because you can also do outside runs, and a lot of times you just need body weight for some of the strength classes. Dun dun dun dun dun. Dun dun. Hi Matty. Wanna go for a walk? (calming music) I'm actually having, probably, I wouldn't say it's like the best birthday ever, but I'm having a pretty great one. I've had so many incredible birthday wishes, and I even got a few flower deliveries, and I got a cake delivered today. So, all things considered, it's been really fun so far, and it's been really nice going out for some walks with Matty. It's also really cool seeing everybody else out walking their dogs. One of my neighbors was like, "Man, It's crazy" "Some of these dogs I bet are so excited to have all of there owners home for so long". Definitely true. Oh my gosh, he's so excited. He's so excited to be outside. Talk about a no contact delivery. I walked outside to take the dog for a walk, and this cake was sitting on my doorstep with some flowers from my family. Some of you might recognize this cake. It's the birthday cake that is in the the Animal Crossing game. This is so freaking cool. It looks exactly like it. Happy Birthday, Justine. This is actually the first time that I've really been outside outside.
